name: Cowboy Boom
description:
Experience Cowboy Action in Cowboy Boom!

Features:

  • A very small endless game with a highscore and 10 achievements to keep you interested
  • 5 full chiptunes tracks for your listening enjoyment
  • A harsh difficulty that allows for a difficult to master gaming experience

Gameplay:

  • Both enemies and the player will die in one hit, creating an always-on-the-edge-of-your-seat experience
  • Weapons will be dropped once you run out of ammo, and you'll need to scramble to get one off a fallen enemy
  • Dynamite is included to put the BOOM in Cowboy Boom
